title: Using Pattern Fills In InDesign CS3
content:
Hi All,

I was wondering if it is possible to fill shapes with patterns/lines/etc. in InDesign CS3 with or without a plug-in.

Thanks for any suggestions or help.
author: A. Hatchett-Brewer

comments.content: I usually make the patterns in Illustrator and import them to InDesign. I'm not aware of pattern fills in InDesign.
